formalpara.title: Internal help for this function in Asterisk 1.6:

para.screen:
-= Info about function 'VOLUME' =-
[Syntax] VOLUME(TX|RX)
[Synopsis] Set the TX or RX volume of a channel
[Description] The VOLUME function can be used to increase or decrease the tx or rx gain of any channel. For example: Set(VOLUME(TX)=3) Set(VOLUME(RX)=2)

formalpara.title: Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.4 to 1.6:
